name: Fried Panic
description:
Survive as long as possible in Fried Panic! Buy weapons, abilities, and even donut producing machines. Fight through waves of eggs, lemons, chicken drumsticks, and much more, all in a top down pixel art style.

Key Features:

  • A unique combat system utilizing each hand separately
  • 15+ unique weapons to buy
  • 10 unique passive abilities to buy
  • 10+ unique enemies to fight
  • 4 passive abilities to buy in the shop
  • 4 skins to buy in the shop
  • Endless waves of increasing difficulty to see how long you can survive
  • An original soundtrack of 5+ songs
  • A unique top down pixel art style
  • A completely free game with no microtransactions
